recipe1.title: Creamy Alfredo Pasta
recipe1.description: A rich and creamy pasta made with our fresh dairy products.
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Melt butter and add cream in a saucepan.
Combine pasta with sauce and serve hot.

recipe2.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipe2.description: A healthy and delicious parfait using our organic yogurts.
steps: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass.
Serve immediately or chill for later.

recipe3.title: Cheddar Mashed Potatoes
recipe3.description: Creamy mashed potatoes loaded with sharp cheddar cheese.
steps: Stir in cheddar cheese until melted.

recipe4.title: Blueberry Smoothie
recipe4.description: A refreshing smoothie made with fresh blueberries and yogurt.
steps: Add all ingredients to a blender.
Pour into a glass and enjoy chilled.

recipe5.title: Caprese Salad
recipe5.description: A fresh salad with mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
steps: Arrange mozzarella and tomato slices alternately on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

recipe6.title: Strawberry Milkshake
recipe6.description: A classic strawberry milkshake made with fresh dairy milk.
steps: Top with whipped cream if desired.

recipe7.title: Spinach & Cheese Omelette
recipe7.description: A protein-packed breakfast with fresh eggs and cheese.
steps: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Cook until set, then fold and serve.

recipe8.title: Vanilla Panna Cotta
recipe8.description: A creamy Italian dessert made with milk and cream.
steps: Heat milk, cream, and sugar until warm.
Add vanilla and pour into molds.

recipe9.title: Mac & Cheese
recipe9.description: Classic macaroni and cheese with a creamy cheese sauce.
steps: Make a roux with butter and flour, add milk.
Mix with pasta and serve warm.

recipe10.title: Chocolate Yogurt Dip
recipe10.description: A sweet and healthy dip made with Greek yogurt and cocoa.
